comment: There's a bug with the app all of a sudden. Now when you press the mike button to speak, it vibrates but it's not transcribing. And if it doesn't transcribe, it can't translate either. I can't even type the text. It won't let me. And sometimes the copy paste doesn't work for the translation.
scenarios: Press the microphone button to speak; the app vibrates but does not transcribe, and therefore cannot translate.
Cannot type the text for translation.
Sometimes the copy-paste function does not work for the translation.
key sentence: Cannot type the text for translation.
